items.content_html: Pictopia is a simple, lightweight gallery library that allows you to display images in a responsive grid. It features fullscreen viewing with navigation, zooming, and thumbnail previews. You can customize the display and easily integrate it into your website with just a few lines of code.
items.title: sumeetghimire/Pictopia-React: Pictopia is a simple, lightweight gallery library that allows you to display images  in a responsive grid. It features fullscreen viewing with navigation, zooming, and thumbnail previews. You can customize the display and easily integrate it into your website with just a few lines of code.
